dc_title_s: The old limits between the Russian and Turkish Empires
dc_description_s: Extent: 1 map | Abstract: Map of a portion of eastern Ukraine extending from the River Dnieper to the River Don, showing "the old Limits be-tween the Russian and Turkish Em-pires," cities and towns, forts, and notes about the populace, features, etc. | Notes: Relief shown pictorially.|Title devised by cataloger.|Likely detached from: Gentleman's magazine, and historical chronicle. Volume IX : for the year M.DCC.XXXIX. London : Printed by Edw. Cave, jun., 1739. Map was originally published in the March 1739 issue. | Scale approximately 1:1,950,000
